mb.title: Mail & Bills Helper
mb.subtitle: Upload a photo or PDF of your bill, letter, or document.
mb.footnote: Your document is processed securely and not stored permanently.
site.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Voyadecir is for informational translation only and is not HIPAA- or FERPA-compliant. Do not upload personal health information (PHI) or student education records. Not legal, medical, or financial advice.
